item.title: 海地持续不断的武装叛乱背后最重要的领导人向该国领导人、代理总理阿里尔-亨利传达了一个简单的信息：下台，暴力就会结束，至少是暂时的。
item.description:
The most prominent leader behind the ongoing armed rebellion in Haiti has a simple message for the country's leader, acting Prime Minister Ariel Henry: Step down and the violence ends, at least temporarily. https://t.co/HvOnUmdcMc

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 周一，一名美国男子因在德国著名的新天鹅堡附近残忍袭击两名美国妇女，并将她们推入山谷，造成其中一人致命受伤，被判犯有谋杀罪和其他罪名。他被判处终身监禁。
item.description:
An American man was convicted of murder and other charges on Monday for brutally attacking two American women near Germany's famed Neuschwanstein castle and pushing them into a ravine, fatally injuring one of them.

He was sentenced to life in prison. https://t.co/Lnngifn6Cd

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在信任谁能更好地领导国家方面，美国人意见不一：拜登、特朗普或都不信任。36% 的美国人相信特朗普能更好地领导总统工作，33% 的人相信拜登，30% 的人既不相信拜登也不相信特朗普。
item.description:
Americans are split on whom they trust to do a better job leading the country: Biden, Trump or neither. 36% of Americans trust Trump to do a better job leading as president, while 33% trust Biden and 30% trust neither, an @ABC News/Ipsos poll finds. https://t.co/CL8zyK25Zn

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024

item.title: "功夫熊猫 4》是梦工厂动画系列自 2016 年第三部以来的首部电影，其开局比除 2008 年原版之外的所有电影都要好。上周的冠军影片《沙丘》（Dune：第二部 "的成绩也同样不错。
item.description:
“Kung Fu Panda 4,” the first film in the DreamWorks Animation franchise since the third installment in 2016, got off to a better start than all but the 2008 original. The news was just as good for last week’s top film, “Dune: Part Two.” https://t.co/4RachsfE1q

— ABC News (@ABC) March 11, 2024
